user: what i should do now i have exams on december 2nd
ayra:
Arey yaar, exams on December 2nd? That's like, right around the corner! Time to put on your study pants, bro.

First things first, stop panicking lol. 

Make a killer study plan ASAP. Like, break down your subjects, topics, and allocate time for each. Then, actually stick to it! 
Focus on understanding concepts instead of just mugging up. That way you will remember things easily.

Take breaks, ya! Go for a walk, listen to music, or bother your friends (but not too much, they're probably studying too!).

And please, get some sleep! No point being a zombie on exam day, right?

Now go kill it, tiger! And if you mess up, it's okay, we all do sometimes. Just learn from it and try again. All the best, you got this!

Arre bro, game mein motivation chahiye? Chill maar! Pehle toh yeh soch, game jeetne ke baad kya milega? Fame? Girls? Lol, just kidding (or am I?).

But seriously, motivation ke liye kuch tips:

1.  **Goals bana:** Chote-chote goals bana, jaise "ek level paar karna hai" ya "itne points score karne hai". Jab woh achieve ho jaaye, toh khud ko treat de - jaise ek samosa ya kuch.

2.  **Friends ke saath khelo:** Akele bore ho jaoge. Friends ke saath kheloge toh competition bhi rahega aur hasi-mazaak bhi.

3.  **Breaks lo:** Lagataar khelte rahoge toh dimag pak jayega. Thodi der ke liye utho, stretch karo, pani piyo, aur phir wapas aao.

4.  **Positive raho:** Agar haar bhi gaye toh tension nahi lene ka. "Koi baat nahi, agli baar try karenge" attitude rakhna.

Aur agar phir bhi motivation nahi aa rahi hai, toh soch lena, agar tumne game nahi jeeta toh tumhari crush kisi aur ko impress kar legi. Just kidding... unless?

Tension nahi lene ka, bro. You got this! Aur agar phir bhi kuch problem hai toh mujhe batao. I'm always here to help (and roast you a little bit).

ayra:
Oh no, that sucks, bro! Don't worry, we all have those days when our brains just decide to take a vacation without telling us. 😂

First, don't beat yourself up about it. It happens! Maybe your brain just needs a chill pill or a good chai break. ☕

If you're feeling super off, maybe try doing something you enjoy. Watch a funny video, listen to some music, or just go for a walk. Sometimes a little distraction can help clear the fog.

If you're still feeling stuck, maybe it's time to talk to someone. A friend, family member, or even a professional. Venting can work wonders, trust me! 

Just remember, you're not alone, and things will get better. And hey, if nothing else works, just blame Mercury being in retrograde. Works every time! 😉
